text:
1935
Prof. B. B. Brackett
Secretary-Treasurer National Assn, of Educational Broadcasters
c/o Radio Station KUSD
Vermillion, S. Dakota
Dear Sir:
Please enroll_
(Bane of college or university)
as a nonber of the National Association of Educational Broadcasters for
which I an enclosing the enrollment fee of $10.00. Our program is broad¬
cast over Station_• Please send receipt and put ny name on
the nailing list to receive the 1935 bulletins.
Yours truly.
Associate membership $2.50
